about_the_game:
This Triple A Visual Novel has mystery, comedy, journalism, and asmr rolled up into an adventure for those who really want to figure out a bizarre conflict and stop the panic gripping a city. From the minds of Troma, comes a sequel to the breaded, battered, and fun-fried Troma Classic "Poultrygeist: Night of the Living Chicken" The story follows the murder of a chicken and destruction of a lawn mower that teeters the city closer to a riot and an even more powerful looming magical threat. This is for gamers who really want to live through a kick ass comic book with brutal anime style action, rich horror lore, and TRULY think the can crack any case.

Chicken death strikes the Previous City! A lawn mower destroys a chicken. As the suburban chicken owners clash with the Lawnmowers, a riot threatens to ensue. It is only the promise of the Mayor intervening that temporarily calms this riot. However in the midst of this conflict of lawns a magical power grows and seems to be linked to the chicken massacre.

The gameplay involves exploring the city for info about the Mayor's location. The player chooses paths from odd, cool, funny and bizarre scenes from potential leads. As the game progresses on the path the player chooses you will try to gather as much info as possible to solve calming down the riot and what is causing the magical disturbance.
